physical_appearance:The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a large building with a dome that is decorated with panels around its circumference. It is multi-storey and to the left of the photograph
 a couple of pediments capping the building\u0027s façade can be seen. There are numerous windows on the second and first floors
 as well as arches on the first floor. In front of the museum is a street whereby a car
 several people
 and a traffic light are present.

metadata.title_text: National Museum of Singapore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a large building with a dome that is decorated with panels around its circumference. It is multi-storey and to the left of the photograph, a couple of pediments capping the building's façade can be seen. There are numerous windows on the second and first floors, as well as arches on the first floor. In front of the museum is a street whereby a car, several people, and a traffic light are present.
